greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) is derived from n by replacing each 0 in its binary representation with a string of n 0's.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
maple: b:= proc(n, k) option remember; `if`(n<2, n,
program: return 0 if n == 0 else int(bin(n)[2:].replace('0','0'*n),2) # _Chai Wah Wu_, Jan 29 2021
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Jan 15 2021
